title: Johan：今天将发布0.10.3
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
Johan：
We added a realy bad bug yesterday that we missed while testing. We will release a 0.10.3 version today that fixes that. :)
Johan：
我们昨天添加了一个十分糟糕的、在测试时错过的漏洞。我们将在今天发布0.10.3以修复它。:)

replies.author: 武王撞钟
replies.txt_content: 更新得有点快，不过是漏洞修复

replies.author: a8105
replies.txt_content:
手机版的进度比PC慢多了...
话说8级能扣分么...我怎么不能
好吧,看错ID了

replies.author: Wolverine
replies.txt_content: 更新频率好快，可IOS却更新的好慢。。。
